title: "Cleaning coded data"
output: html_notebook

```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

cases <- read.csv(here("Data", "cases1_100.csv"))
```


```{r}
grouped_cases <- cases %>% select(-) %>% group_by(document_name) %>% mutate(across(Case.law..Civil:Type..First.instance, .fns = sum))
```
